type.description: Replaces the current sphere the shooter has with a defined sphere. This can be used to spawn otherwise unobtainable bonus balls, i.e. wild or lightning.

color.description: A sphere ID of a sphere the shooter should get.

type.description: Spawns a certain amount of a defined sphere to the shooter. This can be used to i.e. spawn 10 daggers the player can shoot anywhere they want.

color.description: A sphere ID of a sphere the shooter should get.

count.description: How many spheres of that type should be given.

type.description: Replaces the default shooting speed and spawns a speed shot beam effect.

time.description: The duration of the effect in seconds.

speed.description: A new speed of the shot balls, in pixels per second.

type.description: Changes the speed of spheres on the board.

speedBase.description: A value to be added to the multiplied sphere speed.

speedMultiplier.description: A multiplier by which the nominal path speed will be multiplied.
speedMultiplier.markdownDescription:
A multiplier by which the nominal path speed will be multiplied.
The formula for the final speed is: `speedBase + (pathSpeed * speedMultiplier)`.

decceleration.description: A sphere decceleration rate which will be applied alongside speed changes.

time.description: The duration of the effect in seconds.

type.description: Clears the board from all spheres.
Destroys the spheres of a specified color.

color.description: The color of spheres to be destroyed.

type.description: Spawns a scorpion on the board.
Starts a lightning storm, spawning a given amount of strikes which destroy single spheres.
Activates a net which collects collectibles for a given amount of time.

time.description: The duration of the effect in seconds.

type.description: Changes the game speed to a defined value for a specified period of time.

duration.description: The duration of the effect in seconds. It is not affected by the game speed itself.

type.description: Sets the current level combo to a specified value.

combo.description: The combo value to be set.

type.description: Grants a certain amount of score to the current player.
Grants a single coin to the current player.
Adds one to the gem pickup statistics for the current level.
